column1: short of a length wide outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
length ball shaping away outside off, opens the face and jabs it wide of gully
short of a length and some curve into the corridor. Defends to point off the back foot
just past gully who is diving full length to his right with one hand. Another poke away from the body from Liton against an outswinger. Zooms past Dinesh Karthik
length ball swinging away from the corridor, left alone
length ball swinging away from the corridor, defended to point off the front foot
short of a length and in at off stump. Allows it to come on and steers it past gully with soft hands
length ball just outside off, blocked solidly on the front foot
short and wide outside off, swipes at it and can't get bat away from the body
outside edge past first slip comfortably. Would probably not have carried to second either. Bumrah gets a length ball to straighten and Mehidy jabs at it unsurely but with soft hands
length on off stump, defended with soft hands
short ball just outside off, opens the face but can't get this past gully
length on the pads, clipped to midwicket on the up
length on the pads, allows it to come on and whips it to fine leg
length ball into the pads. He can't get the flick away and it deflects into the leg side off the pad
short and very wide outside off. Goes after it with the cut but can't make connection
nice looking shot. Allows it to swing into him, gets on top of the bounce of this short of a length ball and tucks it to fie leg's left
length in the corridor, follows it with his hands and stabs to backward point's left. It's Jadeja there, but they seem to have made the run as his throw comes in and misses
shot. It's Liton in all the glory he usually provides when he's making good connection. Length ball on middle stump, jumps down the track and uses his wrists to caress this through square leg
short and into the hips. A little hurried this time. He swivels and gets it through square leg
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the back foot
length ball in the corridor, hurries onto him as he gets on the back foot to try and punch through cover. Can only slice to backward point
short ball slanted down leg side, can't get bat on the flick
shot. Nicely on top of the bounce against this in the corridor, and gets a full punch through this time to get it through cover
length on leg stump, tapped to mid-on on from the crease
short of a length and cramping him on off stump. Opens the face and runs it straight to backward point
length on off stump, opens the face as he blocks on the front foot

gorgeous. It's that time again, when we talk about how good this guy looks in the hope he doesn't step out and chuck his bat on the stumps next ball. Stays back in the crease, allows the short ball to come on and despite its steepness, gets on top of it and guides it to the square leg boundary with a hook
length ball into the pads, stays tall and tickles it fine
another pleasing shot. Punched straight to cover though. Feet a little bit still against this length ball outside off, but he's right behind it and offers a high elbow
full on off stump, jammed back to the bowler off the front foot
full on off stump, looks to push it into the covers with the turn but this slides straight on. Rolls back down the pitch off the inside edge
length on off stump, pushed towards long-off with the turn. Chahal gets in the way
inside edge past off stump. Full ball sliding outside off. He looks to slice it for one that bounce, but it stays low. Deflected to short fine off Dhoni's pad
tossed up on leg stump, gets to the pitch and chips it to deep midwicket's left. Jadeja there will only allow one
length on leg stump, tapped through square leg
slower ball at a length wide outside off. He looks to chuck the bat at this but it trickles to point off the under-edge
offcutter at a length on off stump. Blocked on the front foot
length ball into the pads, uses the angle to run it down to fine leg
slower ball coming in at off stump on a length. Defends with soft hands

lofted over wide mid-on. Superb batting. It's a regular paced delivery from Bumrah so there is climb on it. Back of a length and angled inwards. Liton uses all of that as he steps down and uses his hands to swipe from under the ball
length on the pads, tapped into the leg side with soft hands
length on off stump, punched down the pitch on the up
swept over the deep backward square boundary with the pace. Full ball down leg side, he shuffles into the off and takes on the part of the field where there's no protection. Bit of a ramp in the end
full on middle stump, tapped towards mid-on
full on middle stump, gets to the pitch and nudges it wide of deep midwicket off the front foot. That is fifty for Bangladesh's new opening pair
full on leg stump, flicked past square leg
pumps it over wide long-on! Oh he's doing whatever he wants today. This is lobbed up at leg stump, get clears the front leg and swings cleanly to clear the boundary.
length outside off, driven on the rise to cover
length on leg stump, clipped to square leg off the front foot
offcutter at a length outside off, stays deep in the crease and scythes this to third man
full toss wide outside off. Too easy. Deftly slices it past point
full on off stump, toe-ended drive to extra cover on the up
short of a length offcutter in the corridor. Ramps it to third man after waiting for it to come on
length at middle stump, adjusts to defend back to the bowler after shaping to drive
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg
length on off stump, shuffles and just manages to get bat on this as he taps to midwicket
length outside off, defended solidly on the front foot

lbw appeal is turned down. Once again he's shuffled a long way. This time he's caught on the thigh guard as he looks to flick. India won't review. This looks much closer on replay. Both middle and leg were visible and it didn't seem as high as it first appeared
length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket
good length on off, and spinning into his pads. Goes onto the back foot, and nudges this to backward square leg
flighted full outside off, and he crunches this off the front foot. But the drive goes straight to Rohit at cover
overpitched outside off stump, and Mehidy takes a big stride forward to drive with the angled bat to cover point
hurries onto Mehidy! Length ball on off, but turning into him. Little footwork from him meant the ball cramped the batsman, but he manages to work this uncomfortably to the leg side
play and a miss. Tossed up outside off, and he drives inside the line of the ball. Dhoni collects
full on middle, and worked off the front foot with soft hands. Played towards midwicket
welcomes him with a slap! Full just outside off, and he carves a square drive through the infield! Classy way to get to your maiden ODI fifty
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover

Liton's thrown it away, but wait, Chahal's dropped it! Full on off, and Liton tried to slog sweep. Top-edges it to midwicket, where Chahal was running back. But he fluffs the catch while falling over backwards. Hopefully he isn't hurt.
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot to cover with soft hands
wider outside off, and he taps this with the angled bat towards cover point
full and aimed at off stump. Comfortably caressed down the ground to long off
full just outside off, and driven with the straight bat. Kuldeep scampers to his lfet and intercepts
half-tracker on off stump, and this one skids through. Mehidy swivels to pull this along the ground to deep midwicket
good length outside off stump, and spinning inwards. Punched off the back foot to mid off
flighted on leg stump, and he shuffles inside the line of the ball, and then drives inside-out to long off
full just outside off stump. Mehidy pushes with soft hands and calls for a quick single even before point could start running towards the ball
good length on leg stump, and this one goes straight through. Worked off the back foot to square leg for a quick run once again
full outside off stump. Spinning away from the batsman, and he punches this off the front foot to wide long off
full just outside off stump, and Mehidy takes a big stride forward to lean into a drive
full just outside off again, but Mehidy knows this length now. Pushed to cover off the front foot
length ball just outside off, and Mehidy rocks back to try and cut this square. Too close to his body, and just misses the outside of his bat
good length, but wider outside off. Mehidy connects with the cut this time, but it's been mistimed to backward point
full just outside off, and he caresses a drive past the diving bowler's left to long off. Ruins the chance of a maiden over for Jadeja, but it was still excellent bowling from the left-arm spinner
full on off stump, and he smothers a check-drive past cover's right to wide long off
overpitched just outside off stump, and he allows Mehidy to free his arms. Crunches a square drive with the angled bat past the diving cover-point fielder. Rayudu the guilty man there
length ball on off, and spinning into the batsman. Goes onto the back foot, and whips it off his hips to midwicket
full just outside off stump, and pushed with the bat's open face to cover
paddled! Full on off, and he goes down on one knee. Scoops it past MSD's left for a couple more
full just outside off stump. Mehidy shuffles across to his off stump, and fends off the back foot
good length just outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
big shout for lbw! But not given. Length ball on off, and the batsman came down the ground to try and swing across to the leg side. Hit his front eg, but he was halfway down the ground
back of a length on off, and Liton uses the depth of his crease to pull this right over the mid-wicket fielder. Timed well enough to clear the infield
full just outside off, and the front-foot drive goes straight to Rohit at cover
swung across the line! But Rayudu's sliding effort in the deep stops the boundary. Full outside off, and he dragged a slog-sweep from outside the stumps
full on off stump, and pushed off the front foot to wide long off for a walking single
full on leg stump, and the leg-side push takes a leading edge past the vacant first-slip region! First real false shot.
waist-high full toss on off stump, and he uncomfortably punches this past the cover fielder to the man in the deep
full just outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Driven off the front foot to cover
direct hit! They tried to pinch a single, but Dhawan's throw from short fine-leg hits the stumps. Whipped off the back foot for a quick run, and replays show the batsmen are safe
good length on off, and spinning further away. Liton backed away to cut, but he's forced to reach at the ball moving away. Mistimes the shot to point
length ball outside leg stump, and spinning into the right hander. Tapped off the back foot with soft hands to see the over out
full on middle stump, and clipped off the front foot to square leg. They walk across for one
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover. The ball dribbles away
full just outside off once again. Pinpoint accuracy, but defended off the front foot
full on middle stump, and he drives with the angled bat to mid on. No chance of a run though
edges a cut to the third-man boundary! Was too close to his body, but he went for the shot anyway. Just past Dhoni's right.
full on off stump, and he offers the bat's full face to defend. Drinks
full just outside off stump. He takes a big stride forward and drives through to wide long off
dabbed! Length ball on off stump, and he stays on the back foot, before playing a teasing late cut past Dhoni's right. Short third man gives it a chase
back of a length on leg stump, and worked off his hips to square leg. They scamper across for one
flighted just outside off stump. Mehidy uses the bat's angle, and clips this away to midwicket for another run
full on middle stump, and pushed down the ground past the bowler's left to long off
overpitched on middle stump, and Mehidy raises his back leg to get the full swing of his bat. Strikes a straight-drive right back to the bowler, who does well to get down and intercept the shot
full outside off stump, and Liton gets down on one foot, and check-sweeps this past the fielder at square leg! No one there near fine leg, and the ball races away for four more
length ball just outside off stump. Cut off the back foot to point
full on off, and he comes onto the front foot for a defensive shot
carbon copy of that previous sweep! Full on off again, and Liton goes across the line early and then times that sweep to perfection behind square
good length just outside off, and he cuts this off the back foot to point
length ball on off stump, and fended with the bat's open face to cover point
drops it short at a middle stump line and he gets back to pull to deep square
length on middle stump, allows it to come on and tickles it through square leg
length on middle stump, leans in and nudges it to square leg's left...he throws badly at the striker's end and gives away another run
tossed up at off stump, down the track to flick but this rolls down the pitch off the leading edge

finds cover point! Mehidy goes a long way into the leg side and deep into the crease. He wants to crash this through the covers, but Jadhav has made him wait and wait and his hurried flap at this won't go further than Rayudu
length ball skidding into leg stump. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length and slow outside off. Chopped into the covers
length on off stump, gets deep in the crease and punches to sweeper cover
length on off stump, pushed into the covers off the outside half of the bat
full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-on
shot. Tossed up wide outside off, slashed to sweeper's left
length ball pitches on leg and goes down further
short of a length outside off, flicks to square leg off the back foot
full toss on off stump, punched to long-off
short of a length and fired in at middle stump. Punched to extra cover
full outside off, jammed to point
yorker length at off stump, driven to long-off
short outside off, gets back and punches to the bowler
shot!Not a lot of pace on this short ball outside off. But he manages to play the late cut and bisect backward point and short third man
length on off stump, slides on with the angle and takes the leading edge as he look to flick
length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket
full outside off, driven back to the bowler
googly lobbed up full on leg stump, flicked to square leg

given lbw! Kayes reviews. That's a top ball from Chahal, but has that struck outside off? It's ripped past the inside edge and hit him on the back thigh as he's pushed forward. Looks good but this will come down to impact. No bat on it...impact is umpire's call. That's hitting the stumps. Kayes is gone. That was very close. Length ball dipped nicely outside off and he was playing outside the line
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, tapped into the off side
length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length outside off, looks to force it through the off side, gets it down the pitch off the inside half
short and wide outside off, under-edged cut to point
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
shot. Too slow, too short. Plenty of time to get back and slap it to the cover boundary
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
length on off stump, pushed back down the pitch
full on off stump, gets down and loses some shape as he sweeps this. Gets it to deep square's left off the thick inside edge
length on leg stump, tapped into the leg side
full outside off, looks to drive, gets it off the under-edge
full on off stump, drives towards long-off but the bowler won't let it through
floated up at leg stump, gets to the pitch and flicks to long-on
full on off stump, driven to long-on with the turn
length on off stump, pushed to square leg off the front foot
short and wide outside off, slapped to extra cover off the back foot

finds deep midwicket! Oh that's a poor shot from Mushfiqur. Half-tracker outside off. He's hit a similar ball through cover for a four last time round. This time he tries to clear the boundary on the leg side. That's a big boundary on that side and he has been caught some 10 yards in. The pull was on, but with Jadhav's slowness and lack of bounce, going aerial was ill-advised
short outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket against the turn
outside edge to short third man. Length ball drifted in at off, once again looks to drive without getting to the pitch
full on off stump, driven to long-off
googly on leg stump, met on the full but hit straight to midwicket
length on middle stump, turning away from him and he can't get the flick further than pitchside

run-out at the non-striker's end! This is chaos! Liton has belted a lovely drive that would have pierced the off-side ring if the fielder at extra cover wasn't Jadeja. He has gone flying to his left, despite a seemingly bad bounce that was making the ball rise, and collected cleanly. In the meantime, Liton has been ball-watching as Mithun has taken off. Jadeja is quickly back up, shapes to throw at the striker's end, but maintains his composure and stops. Finds the non-striker's end is the way to go and sends in a throw on the bounce. Stunning, stunning work. it's what you expect of him. But where was the calling from Liton?
short of a length just outside off, tapped past the bowler
short ball outisde off, flicked to square leg
nicely placed. Full ball outside off, gets low and sweeps aerially, flat, to the square leg boundary
maiden century in international cricket for Liton Das. What a knock. He has look unperturbed and classy throughout the day. Length ball on middle and he's down the pitch to drive to long-on with calm
length on off stump, closes the face on this but it bobs back down the pitch
full on leg stump, driven to midwicket
length on middle stump, pushed uppishly back to the bowler
length on off stump, tapped into the covers off the front foot
short ball on middle stump, turns it to deep square's left with the horizontal bat
length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot to the off side
length ball on off, and spinning inwards. Fended off the front foot
the wrong'un! But Mahmudullah keeps his eyes on the ball. Full delivery turning away, and carved with soft hands to cover point
tossed up on off stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid off. No run
flighted full on middle stump. He comes onto the front foot, and drives this straight back to Kuldeep. Sharp work from the bowler on his followthrough
half-tracker on middle stump, and he rocks back to pull this hard! Chase for KL Rahul at deep midwicket, but he runs to his right and dives to stop a certain boundary
full just outside off, and he gets onto the front foot for a cover drive. Stopped by Jadeja
length ball on middle stump, and he stays on the back foot. Punched straight back to the bowler
back of a length, but slower from Bhuvi. He throws his hands at it, and the jab takes a top-edge between the keeper and short third man for a single
full on off stump, and firmly driven off the front foot with the angled bat. Straight to cover once again
full on off stump, and aimed at the wickets. Tentatively driven to mid off
good length, that test match line just outside off stump. Fended with the angled bat to point, but says no to the single
full on leg stump, and pushed off the front foot towards the leg side. Played with soft hands

full just outside off, and he slogs across the line. Not hit off the bat's middle, and Bumrah does really well to run to his right from cow corner and then slide across the grass to take a double-handed catch. Not the prettiest of catches, but he did well to compose himself after putting in the yards. Bangladesh at 151 for 5
good length on middle, and turning across the batsman. Worked off his hips to the leg side
good length on off, and spinning inwards sharply. Pulled off the back foot, but mistimed to deep square leg
through him! Full outside off, and spinning into the left-hander as he tries to play the expansive drive. The ball sneaks between bat and pad on this occasion

good length on leg stump, and spinning across the batsman. Sarkar tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball hits his front leg and then ricochets onto his bat. Muted appeal for lbw from Kuldeep, but Dhoni says not to review. Good call from India, was too high
good length on middle, and pulled off the back foot. Hit along the ground to deep midwicket
full and wide outside off stump. Just over the tramlines, but with the batsman offering no shot, the umpire says it's a wide
good length on middle stump, and punched off the back foot to mid on
full just outside off stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid off. The runs are drying up quick and fast
full just outside off, but he comes forward to convert it into a full toss. Tapped past the bowler's left to long off
good length on off, and straightening after pitching. Defended off the back foot
full on off stump, and he takes a step forward to caress a straight drive to long on. Keeps strike
full on middle stump, and spinning across his body. Tapped off the front foot to mid on
full on middle stump, and spinning away once again. Defended with soft hands towards the off side
flighted full on middle and leg. Comfortably clipped off his toes to Rohit at mid on as they scamper across for a run
full on middle, and that's been swept hard. But straight to Jadhav manning the backward-square boundary
full on middle and leg, and once again smothered down the ground to long on for one
full outside off stump. Enough width to free his arms, and he slaps a drive to Rohit at cover. Time for another drinks break
full on middle stump. Just 76 kph, and he defends this towards the leg side
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Tapped back to the bowler

full on leg stump, and worked off his toes to square leg. The batsman has gone halfway down the wicket, and he's been told to go back. Soumya does well to turn around quickly and scamper back. Dhoni didn't even grab the ball, by the way. His gloves broke the stumps while trying to flick the ball onto the wickets
good length outside off, and he bends his knee to cut this square off the back foot. Straight to point
good length just outside off, and he dabs it off the back foot. Racing past Chahal at short third man, but he manages to pull it back
full just outside off, and he pushes this off the front foot to cover point. Enough time to take the single
full on off, and angling away. Firmly driven off the front foot to mid off, but straight to Karthik near the circle
good length outside off, and he tries to cut this late. Misses as the ball goes over his blade and into MSD's gloves. Could've easily tickled that to the keeper
good length on off stump, and he gets onto the back foot to block
full just outside off, and he's nowhere near the pitch of the ball. Tries to drive through the covers, but the ball moves away after pitching, and also sneaks past the bat's outside edge
back of a length just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to the off side. They want the single, but eventually choose not to after seeing that the ball has gone to Ravindra Jadeja
full on middle, and flicked off his pads to deep backward square. Nicely timed off the bat, and Rayudu's diving effort in the deep ensures it's just two
more round-arm from Jadhav. Full on off, and tapped off the front foot back to the bowler
good length just outside off stump. Skids through as he tries to cut. Misses
bowls this from below sea level. Lands on off as Liton backs away to cut. Mistimed to point
good length just outside off stump. Just 83 kph as Liton tries to muscle this square off the back foot. The cut finds point once again
full on middle, and Liton walks across to the off side on this occasion. Works it off his pads to the vacant square-leg region for one
full on middle stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid off. Just a single off Jadhav's over
almost chopped on! Length ball angling in, and he tries to dab this fine to third man. Inside-edges the shot right onto his boots
good length angling in once again. Liton tries to nudge this towards the off side, but the ball takes an inside edge onto his body once again. The dots are building up
fuller, and outside off stump. He leans into the cover drive, but can't seem to find the gap. Straight to Rohit at cover
back of a length outside off, and he sticks his bat out to steer a late cut past point
back of a length outside off, and he flays a back-foot cut straight to Jadeja at point. Picks up and throws the ball in one single motion, but it can't find the non-striker's stumps
back of a length outside off, and steered off the back foot to Dhawan at third man for a jogging single
uses his feet Full on off, and he dances down the wicket. Swings across the line, and smashes this over midwicket for a much-needed maximum!
full just outside off stump, and he walks down the wicket to tap a check-drive to long on for one
length ball on off, and skidding straight through. Liton makes room and cuts this in front of square to deep extra cover
good length on off, and he makes room to the leg side. Carves it off the back foot past cover point for a single
good length on middle stump, and clipped off his hips to square leg with soft hands
back of a length outside off, and cut away off the back foot to point. Dot to end the over.
short and wide outside off, backs away and stabs it past short third man
googly is dropped short outside off. He drags the pull between deep square and deep midwicket
lovely. Steps out to meet this at the pitch and lofts it straight over the bowler to beat long-on to his left
short of a length outside off, allows it to turn into the him and once again, gets it to dribble past short third man
googly on leg stump, cops it on the body as he looks to sweep this

looks a close stumping appeal. Liton has played this on line - because it is wide, he expects it to turn in. Goes for the flick. But this is a googly. He has his back toe on the line...and not behind it. Liton's gone by the smallest of margins. Margins brought about by the bowler's clever set up and Dhoni's quick hands. It needed something that good to get this man today. He has singlehandedly kept Bangladesh in this final after singhlehandedly making India feel the pressure for most of this innings. A sublime maiden century.
length on off stump, pushed flat on off stump. Pushed to midwicket with the turn
full on off stump, flicked to long-on off the front foot
good length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
flipper is not picked up by Mashrafe. Struck on the pad as he goes on the back foot, but this is sliding down
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up wide outside off, steps out and drills it down to long-off
length on off stump, backs away and exposes the stumps to incoming ball as he punches this to extra cover
clears deep midwicket with a lot of ease. What a shot. Googly lands full on leg stump, he clears the front leg and sends it a long way with the slog sweep
full on leg stump, defended back towards the bowler off the front foot
length ball turning away wide outside off, past the outside edge

googly again and we won't need replays for this done. Mashrafe has stepped out at a short of a length ball and is moving into the leg side with his attempted slog. It spins past the outside edge and he's a long way out
googly, short of a length and in at off stump. Tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
short of a length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
length on leg stump, looks to flick but cops this on the pad
tossed up on leg stump, driven to long-on
floated up full outside off, drills a drive against the turn but it's straight to extra cover
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and in at off stump, tapped into the covers off the back foot
yorker on middle stump, looks to flick but this pings off his front pad in front of point
length on middle stump, defended to extra cover off the front foot
yorker on leg stump, looks to flick but this deflects into the square leg region off the foot
slower ball at a length just outside off, drops it into the gully region with soft hands
length ball going across off stump, a single at point via the inside edge onto pad
length on middle stump, defended towards mid-on off the front foot
yorker at off stump, jammed down to long-off
shot. He'll get a double. Nice flow through the line at this length ball wide outside off, sweeper cleans up to his left
length on leg stump, flicked between fine leg and deep square leg
short of a length outside off from around the wicket. Neatly chopped to third man's left
good yorker. Follows him down leg side and pings his boot. It lobs up for Dhoni
slower ball pushed full on middle stump. Flicked to fine leg's right and Kuldeep's fumble there allows a second
length ball just outside leg stump. Looks to tickle this fine and seems to have got something on it as it lands in front of Dhoni. Erasmus says wide
full on off stump, driven to sweeper cover
length ball down leg side, backs away and looks to go wide of cover. But this deflects onto his front pad off the inside edge
slower ball at a length on leg stump. Backs away and bunts it to extra cover's right

lbw turned down but he's run down the pitch and in the meantime, Manish Pandey has picked up at point and run to the stumps to dislodge the bails. It's a yorker that's probably struck him outside leg. But he's a bit frenzied by it all and does not wait to see what his partner thinks of this. Pandey leaves him no chance and there won't be zooms required for this one either

stunning work from Pandey again but he misses the stumps. Hares to his right as Mustafiz deflects one towards third man off the pad. Puts in a slide, picks up in one motion and gets up to chuck at the stumps. The batsman is unaware of anything happening behind him but he survives
full toss outside off, sliced straight to point
that's well played in the end. The Natmeg from Sarkar. Yorker outside leg stump, gets his front leg out of the way quickly and gets an inside edge to go between his legs and to fine leg's left
yorker down leg side, jams it into the leg side
length ball pushed very wide outside off
yorker on leg stump again, can't get a bat swing in at all. A hurried bat-pad into the off side
lbw appeal is turned down. Around the wicket, length ball in at middle and leg. He jumps off the ground to try and flick this and is struck in front. Dhoni says sliding down
low full toss on middle stump, tapped to long-on
short of a length ball climbs over the stumps as he backs away and looks to pull this

run-out decision sent upstairs. Sarkar was curiously unenthusiastic about the second run...and he's caught short by a sensational throw from Rayudu at long-on. He'd stepped out to this short ball and chipped it towards long-on. The second run was there but he wasn't confident about it if you go by how they completed the first. Rayudu fires it flat to the striker's end and Dhoni is there to catch him about an inch short.
length ball slanted in at leg stump, backs away and looks to slice this, but he's copped it on the thigh guard
bowled him! Bumrah finds the crease first, the leg stump next. The No. 11 can't keep this one out
full on his pads, and flicked off his toes to deep backward square leg to get India's innings off the mark
length ball, but too wide outside off. Picks the length early, and slaps this square past point for the innings' first boundary!
back of a length outside off again. Spinning away from the batsman, as he flat-bats a shot down to long off
length ball angling inwards, and that's been whipped off his pads past the fielder at square leg! Pure placement, played with gentle hands
good length on middle, and spinning down leg. Rohit swivels and pulls along the ground, but the shot finds Rubel at square leg
too short from Mehidy. Half-tracker spinning inwards, and he nudges a shot off the back foot to square leg. Wants the single, but Dhawan says no
good length just outside off, and pushed off the back foot to cover
good length on the fourth-stump line outside off. Firmly blocked off the front foot to cover
full on off, but angling into his pads. Clipped away - off his legs - to the fielder at deep backward square. Soumya Sarkar cleans up

good length just outside off, and angling in after pitching. Dhawan prods forward to defend, but the ball hits his back leg. Appeal for lbw in unison but the umpire shakes his head. They consider reviewing, but eventually don't. Too high anyway
full just outside off, and he tentatively pushes off the front foot. The bat turns in his hands and trickles back to The Fizz
good length, but wide outside off stump. Dhawan chooses not to play at it, and the ball goes into the keeper's gloves
back of a length on middle, but spinning into Rohit's pads. Misses the flick, and hits his front leg. Big appeal for lbw but not given. Would've definitely gone down leg stump
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot
good length on leg stump, and spinning further down leg. Rohit has no trouble in opening his stance, and then swats a pull past the fielder at square leg for another leg-side boundary!
length ball on off, and turning in. Punched off the back foot to mid on
tossed up on middle and leg. Rohit clears his back leg, and drives down the ground to mid on
length ball outside off, and angling into the left-hander. He rocks back to punch towards mid off
full on middle, and Rohit drives with the angled bat towards midwicket. Struck well, and the infielder must give it a chase
good length just outside leg stump. Straightens after pitching and hits his front leg! Big appeal for lbw again but not given. Clearly pitching outside the stumps
full on middle, and tentatively defended towards the leg side for a single. They scamper across for one
full and wide outside off stump. Allows Dhawan to clear his arms, and he caresses a square drive through the infield! Races away as the crowd goes ballistic
full just outside off stump. Fended
full just outside off once again. Leans forward to defend towards cover and see the over out
half-tracker on off, and he pulls this over mid on. Enough legs to clear the boundary as the batsman share some glove love. Too easy, too loose
back of a length on off, and angling into Rohit. Punched off the back foot to long off for a single
paddled fine! Almost Sachin-esque. Overpitched outside leg stump, and Dhawan slaps a paddle right past the keeper's right for four more runs. Poor bowling from Nazmul thus far

soft dismissal! And Nazmul does the naagin dance! Full outside off, and spinning away from Dhawan. Tries to drive this over mid off, but toe-ends it straight to Soumya Sarkar. There's the first wicket
good length just outside off, but turns after hitting the deck. Rayudu taps this off the back foot to point
back of a length just outside off, and punched off the back foot to mid off. Can't beat the infield
overpitched just outside off, and he wedges a drive straight to backward point
length ball on middle stump, and nudged off the front foot to the leg side
length ball angling away, and Rohit tries to cut square. Struck supremely well, but finds the point fielder on this occasion
full on leg stump, and comfortably clipped off his toes to the fielder at fine leg
back of a length just outside off stump. Sticks his bat out and steers it past backward point for a single
classic Rohit pull! Short on off, and he uses the incoming angle to smack this right over the square-leg boundary. Excellent way to end the over
full just outside off, and driven back to Nazmul off the front foot
good length just outside off stump. Rocks back to punch down the ground to mid off
good length on off once again. Fneded off the back foot to mid off for a single
full just on middle stump. Defended off the front foot.
length ball on middle. Angling into his pads, and nudged off the back foot to the leg side
full on off, and he caresses a front-foot punch to wide long off for a single
back of a length outside off, and he defends with soft hands off the back foot
full on leg stump, and pushed off his pads past the fielder at midwicket

edged! Length ball outside off, and moving away after hitting the deck. Rayudu tries to drive for the ball that comes in, but this does enough to beat his bat and also take a feather-touch off it! A more sedate celebration from the experienced Mashrafe
full on leg stump, and Karthik comes down the ground in a bid to flick this square. But the ball goes down leg for a wide
length ball on off, and angling into his body. Worked off his hips to the leg side

good length on off, and angling inwards again. DK tries to flick this off his pads again, but he's deceived by the slower ball. Hits his front leg, but the ball would definitely have missed the stumps
length ball on middle, and tapped off the front foot to midwicket. Tight call for run, but they manage to scamper across. Gets off the mark
good length outside off stump. Karthik goes onto the back foot, and then cuts this in front of square to deep extra cover
length ball just outside off. Punched off the back foot to cover
length ball on off stump, and nonchalantly punched off the back foot to long off
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to long off for another easy single
full just outside off, and he smothers a cover drive straight to the fielder
good length angling into his pads. Worked off his hips to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side
full ball on off stump. Angling into Rohit as he whips this off his feet to the leg side. Trickles away to midwicket
good length outside off stump. Tailing in slightly and that's been exquisitely punched through the infield for four! Bring on the action replay.
length ball just outside off, and Rohit steers this off the back foot to third man for a jogging single
back of a length outside off, and DK lets the ball come onto him. Tries to dab a shot past the slip fielder, but Mehidy's full-stretched dive ensures India can't pinch the single
length ball just outside off, but tailing into DK's body. Looks to work it away off his hips, but misses. Hits his back leg and almost rolls onto the stumps
back of a length outside off, DK looks to whip it square off the back foot, but the ball hits his hip
short and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
full on leg stump, flicked straight to mid-on
length on off stump, defended solidly off the front foot
short of a length just outside off, looks to drop it into the covers, but he can't get it wide enough of the bowler
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs this wide of third man
length on middle stump and straightening a touch. Defended watchfully off the outside half
short of a length on middle stump, tucked to deep square's left off the back foot
short of a length wide outside off, walks down at it but is forced to leave late as it jags away
length ball just outside off, opens the face and drives to point's right

length ball straightening in the channel. Thick outside edge to third man...who feels the need to throw at the stumps after the run is completed. He hits it too, but the deflection gives India an extra run
short and just outside off, a glorious whippy cut to point's left, but third man is very wide and keeps it to two
length on off stump, defended solidly on the front foot
slower ball on a length, cutting into Rohit who can't get bat on the flick. Bit of an appeal for lbw, but he's safe
short of a length in the channel, opens the face and runs it down to third man
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square's left
sharp from Rubel. Karthik's initial weight transfer is forward and he quickly sends him back with a bouncer that fizzes past his right shoulder
short and wide outside off, slashes and gets it our to third man
overpitched outside off and he plays the wrong line as he looks for the cover drive. It trickles past the bowler and to mid-off's right
length outside off, a late drive on the up to get it to sweeper's left
moves at the ball this time, in better shape for the drive. Gets the length ball to sweeper's right
length just outside off, punched to sweeper's left
beaten. Offcutter at a length skids straight on and past the outside edge as he hangs the bat out
another slower ball. Waits for this one and runs it off the face to third man's left

just clears fine leg. Bouncer again, catching an Indian batsman by surprise. This one's headed for the crest on his helmet and he's late on the hook. But it's safely to the fine leg fielder's right off the top edge
length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
offcutter at a length outside off, sliced to point off the front foot
length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket from the crease
length ball shaping into the stumps and he stands tall as he punches elegantly back down the pitch. Finds the stumps at the other end and for some reason...the crowd erupts in boos...

poor judgement all around and at the end of it all, both Indian batsmen survive, the fielder hits the stumps, and gets a earful from Mushfiqur because it's at the wrong end. Terrible calling from Rohit. He punches this past the non-striker and calls for the run. It's his call. Halfway through, he says no. Karthik turns around to run back and...Rohit follows him. Did he forget he said no? Remembers two strides later and is now dashing back to the striker's end as the fielder gets ready to throw. Except, the throw smashes down the stumps at the non-striker's end where Karthik is safely back. Rohit makes it to safety. Surprisingly.
full on off stump, driven firmly to mid-off
length ball slanted into the corridor. Defended off the inside half
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg
shot. Length ball wide outside off, a languid chop on the up to sweeper's left
bouncer dug in too short, lets it go
oh shot. The fielder doesn't let it go though, a tumbling dive to the left at deep square. This was dropped short and Karthik pummeled this off the front foot with a horizontal bat
length on off stump, driven on the rise to mid-off
slower ball on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
length on off stump, punched to mid-off on the up

picks out deep square. Bangladesh are buzzing. Rohit Sharma has handed his wicket off a short ball. Short ball at the hips, goes aerial with the pull. There's at least 30 yards between deep square and fine leg but he doesn't find that gap. Nazmul runs to his right and takes a good catch. Game. On.
short and very wide. He lets it go
short of a length ball in at leg stump. Raps Dhoni on the back foot as he looks to flick. The lbw appeal is turned down
yorker on leg stump, jammed out to mid-on
overpitched just outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on's left
short and wide outside off, left alone
full on off stump, stabs at it from the crease and gets a thick outside edge to third man
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length ball just outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot
short of a length outside off, punched to extra cover's left
nicely timed. Short ball outside off, a controlled pull into the turf and out to deep square
length on off stump, turned to midwicket off the back foot
bouncer dug in too short. Flies over Dhoni's head
length ball dipping in fiercely at middle stump. Tapped back to the bowler
another bouncer. Dhoni steps into the off side and allows this to fly past his front shoulder
length on off stump, defended into the covers off the front foot
length on off stump, defended to point off the front foot
length on off stump, defended off the front foot
length and into the pads. Allows it to come and flicks to fine leg's left
length on off stump, walks down at it and punches to mid-off
short of a length ball wide outside off, spanks it straight to the fielder on the up
full on middle stump. Dhoni walks down the wicket and effictively yorks himself. Bunts it towards mid on
full just outside off. Turning away after pitching, and Dhoni pushes at this with the angled bat to backward point
good length outside off stump. Dhoni moves towards the leg side, and then cuts this square to the sweeper fielder
rocks back and pulls over wide long on! Half-tracker on middle, and that gets the treatment it deserves. Into the second tier
good length outside off, and DK walks down the ground. The ball's almost beaten him by the time he plays a late cut to short third man
full just outside off, and he caresses the drive back to the bowler
good length on off stump, and angling across Dhoni. Left alone
full on middle, and pushed down the ground to mid off. Ariful - the sub - races towards the ball, and his move ensures India don't take a single
full on off stump, and it's too close to Dhoni's body for the drive. But he goes for the shot anyway, and shovels it to point
offcutter, lands full outside off. Going through to the keeper with MSD offering no shot
full on off, and Dhoni skips down the ground. Whips a shot to midwicket, and says no to the single. The throw at the non-striker's end almost hits the stumps, and almost hits DK as well
back of a length on middle stump to end the over. Tapped off the back foot to the vacant cover region for a walking single
full on middle, and the straight drive takes an inside edge. Trickles away to the leg side
full just outside off stump, but angling into Dhoni. Pushed off the front foot to cover point
full on off, and Dhoni comes down the ground. Drives past the non-striker to mid on for a quick single
good length on off, and DK backs away to make some room. Cuts in front of square, but intercepted by the diving cover fielder
full on off, and straightens after pitching. Fended off the back foot
full on off stump, and Karthik sees the over out with the bat's full face. Blocked back to the bowler
full on off, and Dhoni crunches a mistimed cover-drive through the infield! Not off the bat's middle, but he muscles it courtesy his bottom hand past Mashrafe at cover
good length on off, and angling away from him. Tries to cut, but the ball's too close to his body. Mistimed to point
full on off and going across the batsman. Left alone
full and straight on middle stump. Pushed off the front foot to Mashrafe at short cover
good length on middle, and that's been clipped off his hips past square leg. Nice early call for the second run from MSD
offcutter to end the over. Full just outside off, and caressed off the front foot to cover point
length ball on off stump, and spins sharply into the batsman. Pulled over square leg to the man in the deep
drilled! Gives the bowler a charge, and the full-pitched delivery has been smacked past Mehidy's left! Long off has no chance either
slower through the air. Full on off, and he taps this past the non-striker to long on
good length just outside off. No real turn on this occasion. Smothered off his hips to the leg side
overpitched on off stump, and this time DK clears his back leg and swings through the ball's line to long off
full on leg stump, and he works this  - with the spin - to square leg off the front foot
full on middle, and he goes onto the back foot, before working the ball off his pads to square leg
flighted full on middle stump, and Dhoni whips this off his toes to the leg side. Placed into the gap between deep midwicket and wide long on, and the ball races away for another boundary!
full just outside off, and Dhoni uses his feet to Nazmul once again. Toe-ends the drive to long off on this occasion
full just outside off, and DK pushes at it with the bat's open face. Tapped to cover point
full on middle, and DK comes down the wicket. Whips this off his toes to the leg side, but plays it square to the fielder in the deep
full outside off, and spinning away after pitching. Cut with soft hands to the fielder in the deep
length ball on off stump, and skidding through. The ball stays low too, and Dhoni mistimes to cover
length ball on middle, but going down leg. Dhoni tries to paddle this fine, but misses. Sharp take from the keeper and he appeals for caught behind, but the umpire isn't falling for that
length ball wide outside off. Dhoni throws his hands at it, and cuts square to point

overpitched on middle stump, and he taps this to mid on. No single there, but the fielder has a throw at the non-striker's. Mahmudullah isn't backing up, and neither is the man at cover. Misfield on the overthrow means India finally take the single
length ball on middle, and he pulls this along the ground to deep midwicket. Struck well
full just outside off, and comfortably driven to wide long off for a walking single
length ball on off, and angling into the batsman. DK makes room, and punches off the back foot to long off
full outside off, and spinning away. Driven off the front foot to wide long off for a single
full just outside off, and he opens the bat's face on this occasion. Pushed past cover point
full just outside off. Turns after pitching, and DK defends with soft hands
full on leg, and Karthik uses his feet before clipping it to wide long on for a walking single
overpitched on off, and Dhoni leans forward to convert the delivery into a full toss. Driven past cover's right to wide long off once again
good length just outside off, and straightens after pitching. Cut off the back foot to cover, who does well to collect the ball despite an awkward bounce
full on off, and Dhoni checks his shot after walking down the ground. Eventually works it off his pads to the leg side
full just outside off. Defended with soft hands as he offers the bat's full face
overpitched on leg stump. DK is quick to get down on one knee, and he sweeps it fine past the fielder inside the circle! Fifty partnership
full outside off, and spinning into DK. Defended towards cover
full on middle, and he clips this off his toes to short fine leg. DK wants the single, but Dhoni sends him back
full on middle and swept once again. But nicely intercepted by Rubel at short fine leg once more
full just outside off, and he mistimes the cover drive straight back to the bowler. Rubel sticks his right hand ou and stops the ball from going past him
full just outside off. Dhoni walks across to the off side, and taps this back towards mid off
good length on middle, and angling down leg. Dhoni works this off his pads to fine leg for a single
full on off stump, and DK prefers to defend with the full face of the bat. The ball rolls back to Rubel
good length on off, but tailing into DK. Too close to his body for the cut shot, and he carves this to point from near his body
short! Attacking the batsman's body with a short ball on off stump. DK does well to get away from the line of the ball
full on leg stump, flicked to square leg
attempts a legcutter, it slides down leg side
length on off stump, steps out and flicks to midwicket
front-of-the-hand slider on middle stump. Makes room and jabs it to extra cover

he's missed a full toss! Bang in front of middle stump. Mahmudullah has broken the partnership inadvertently. Nothing extraordinary about this ball other than the fact that the batsman has missed it. He was looking to flick from middle stump and just...couldn't.
short of a length on middle stump, punched back down the pitch
dropped short at middle stump. Pulled to deep midwicket's right
bouncer in the corridor, left alone
full and just outside off, stabbed off the front foot to extra cover
length ball hooping in at off stump, jabbed into the off side on the up
full inswinger at off stump. Solid as he punches this to mid-off
short of a length just outside off, pushed to extra cover's left
short ball in at off stump. Looks to tickle it square but he hits it straight to midwicket
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot
beauty. Jadhav doesn't rate spinners. Just does not. Jumps down the track - no more blocking - and meets it at the pitch before launching it straight over the bowler with a neat swing from under it
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length quicker one at leg stump, chips it out to deep midwicket's right with a pull
length on leg stump, flicked to backward square
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
length ball skidding in at off stump. Pokes it between cover and extra cover and makes Jadhav scramble
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on leg stump, steps out and offers the full face as he taps to long-on
short of a length on off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length on leg stump, gently nudged to deep square's right
short ball just outside off, punched to cover's right and the diving Mehidy can't stop that cleanly
length on off stump. Tapped down the pitch off the back foot
length ball angled across the corridor. Turns it to midwicket with a closed face
length outside off, stabbed on the up to extra cover
length on middle stump, tapped to mid-on off the front foot
length outside off, sliced to sweeper cover on the rise
full on off stump, driven to mid-off's right and he's clutching his hamstring after completing the run
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
well done. He's limping after, but it was vital that he got really low for this shot. It was a full ball, he got it on the full and swept it to the deep backward square boundary
length on leg stump, tapped into the midwicket region
length ball wide outside off, left alone
full on leg stump, jammed to midwicket
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot

he's got him! MS Dhoni has stabbed away from the body as this slants across him and it's a simple catch for Mushfiqur. Every Indian in the stadium is stunned. A loud burst from the Bangladesh fans. This is a massive moment.
overpitched on the legs, confidently flicked to deep square's left
length ball at the stumps, walks down at it and taps to midwicket off the inside half
in the air but safely to sweeper's left. Walks at it again and goes with hard hands at this length ball. No control on it, it's a slice
length ball curving in at off stump, blocked solidly into the covers
full inswinger at leg stump. Big appeal as Jadeja falls over and cops this on the pad while looking to flick. But it's going well down
beaten. Length ball wide outside off, climbs up as he looks to run this down to third man. It's taken by Mushfiqur and there's a bit of a conference about a possible review, but they won't take it
slower ball at a length just outside off. Dabs it to point off the front foot
slower short ball just outside off, mistimed chop to point
short ball outside off, shuffles and looks to pull behind square. Struck on the back leg and deflected to Mushfiqur
short of a length at off stump, gets across and taps it behind square
gets it past the keeper and it's well away from fine leg. Mashrafe goes around the wicket and feeds Jadeja on the pads and he gratefully nudges it fine.
beaten. Not convincing first up from Kumar. Swishes at a length ball that is angling viciously across him
length ball pushing across him again and this time he watches it go
short of a length on off stump, tapped into the covers off the back foot with soft hands
full on off stump, driven to extra cover off the front foot
short of a length outside off, gets behind the line and dabs it in front of mid-on
full ball on leg stump, flicked to mid-on off the front foot
short and wide outside off, under-edged cut into the covers
inside edge ad Mushfiqur lunges to his right to parry it away from the path to the helmet and in between fine leg and third man. It's a length ball that doesn't climb as he looks to cut
length on middle stump, punched back to the bowler on the up
slower ball at a length on off stump. Jabs it wide of extra cover with soft hands and Bhuvneshwar calls early for the run
slower ball in the channel, Bhuvneshwar opens the face on it but this slides past the outside edge
short of a length outside off, goes deep in the crease and punches to mid-on
good length just outside off. Straightens after pitching, and Jadeja taps this away to point
full on of, and he pushes at this with soft hands. The ball dribbles away towards extra cover, and the batsmen manage to pinch a single
full just outside off stump. Spinning into Bhuvi, and he drives straight to mid on. No chance of a run
full and wide outside off stump, and Bhuvneshwar tries to drive this away from his body. He misses, and so does the keeper. They scamper across for a run
full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to square leg. They jog across for another
full on leg stump, and he paddles this fine! Gently played, and it allows them to come back for the third. Rubel did well to cut this off though. Every run counts
length ball on off. Angling into Bhuvi, and he muscles a straight drive to long on
darter on middle stump, that skids through to Jadeja. Nudged off his pads to midwicket
full and wide outside off stump, and Jadeja sticks his bat out to steer a square drive past the fielder at point. Calls early for the second run

full just outside off, and he drills a straight drive past the bowler! Nazmul tried to get his hands to it, but he cannot stop the ball, and the umpire skips over the ball to let it go through to the long-off boundary
good length on off, and punched off the back foot to mid on
full just outside off stump. Uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Taps it down to long on and keeps the strike
length ball on middle, and Jadeja defends with soft hands towards point. Carefully played
length ball on leg, and Jadeja charges down the wicket. Punches this with the straight bat, and Rubel bends down to stop the ball from going past him. Another dot
good length just outside off. Angling away from Jadeja, and he plays the late cut to third man for one
full on off, and aimed at the stumps. Bhuvi blocks off the back foot, and the ball rolls down to mid on
back of a length outside off, and his back-foot punch takes an inside edge onto his body
full on off stump, and he whips this off his pads to midwicket. Can't pinch the single though. Mashrafe appealed for the lbw, but it was definitely bat first
good length on off, and to close to his body for the cut. Steered right to point
length ball outside off, and angling away from Jadeja. He slaps a cut past the cover-point fielder and jogs across for another single
good length on middle, and going down leg. Bhuvi looks to work it off his hips, but can't connect with the shot
full on off stump, and defended straight. Mashrafe was running to his left, but changes his direction and dives to his right to them stop the ball
play and a miss. Short and wide outside off, and Bhuvi fails to connect with a square cut. The ball goes under his bat
full outside off, and driven to short cover. But misfield from Liton means they can scamper across for one
good length on off stump, and punched off the back foot to mid on for a single. Mashrafe gives it his all, and he's on the ground in a bid to field the ball. That's the end of his spell
good length from around the wicket. Lands on middle, and Jadeja makes room to punch down the ground
full outside off, and Bhuvi backs away to lift a drive right over the infield. Chipped, really, and that's enough for India to collect a double
good length on middle, and he mistimes a pull past square leg. Just a single this time
good length on middle, but angling down leg. Whipped off his pads to deep square leg. They're rotating the strike with ease now
flat on middle, and he clips it off his pads to the fielder at short fine leg
full on off, and his leg-side tap takes a leading edge towards the bowler. No run
full just outside off, and Bhuvi swings across the line after clearing his front leg. But mistimes the shot down to mid on
short on off stump, and Bhuvi chooses to let this ball go. Looks at the square-leg umpire, who says it's not a wide
crunched! Full on off, and Bhuvi clears his front leg and check-drives right over Rubel's head! Soars over the long-off boundary as the crowd erupts in delight
full on middle but going down leg. Hits his front leg, but they manage to pinch a run anyway
back of a length on middle stump, and Jadeja rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
full on middle, and driven to mid off for a quick single. Jadeja's got to hurry, but he makes it across easily. The fielder's throw was nowhere near the non-striker's stumps
back of a length outside off, and he tries to steer a late cut to third man. Finds the fielder poaching at backward point. India need 18 off 23 now
good length outside off, and the square cut finds backward point once again! Carbon copy of the last shot. 18 off 22 now
back of a length outside off. Angling into Jadeja, and he steers this perfectly to third man for a walking single
back of a length on middle, and fended off the back foot. Bhuvi wants to take a single, but Jadeja screams 'no'
good length just outside off. Defended off the back foot to cover on this occasion
clipped! And it runs away for a boundary. India have the advantage once more. Full on leg stump, and Bhuvi closes his bat's face and tickles a shot to the fine-leg boundary!

back of a length on off, and he punches to short mid off for a quick run. The fielder tries to run Jadeja out at the bowler's end, and he misses. Nobody's backing up, so India pinch a second run as well. Oh dear

tickled! But the umpire doesn't raise his finger. Bangladesh are reviewing. It was a length ball angling across Jadeja. He tried to drive away from his body, and there was a faint noise as the ball went past him. UltraEdge says 'out' and Bangladesh get a last-gasp hope
back of a length just outside off, and flicked away to the vacant square-leg region for a single. Jadhav hobbles across for one
slower ball, full outside off. Worked away to the leg side, but straight to midwicket
back of a length just outside off. Tries to steer this to third man, but it's too close to his body. Played to point
good length on middle, and he uncomfortably punches down the ground. Bhuvi will keep strike. India need 9 off 12.
taken by the keeper! Angling away from Bhuvi and he looks to drive away from his body. The keeper dives to his right and takes an excellent diving catch! Twist in the tail?
full just outside off, and he defends towards cover. But the ball takes a leading edge towards the leg side instead. India won't mind how they come
full just outside off, and the push goes straight to backward point. Says no to the single. India need 8 off 9 now.
good length just outside off. Angling across Jadhav, and he taps this away to point. Can't find the single
back of a length on middle. Jadhav fends off the back foot, and the ball hits his glove. Kuldeep wants the run, but Jadhav says no.
length ball on off, and that's been cut away to deep point for a couple more. India need six but Kuldeep will be on strike
full just outside off, and caressed down the ground to wide long off. Gets Jadhav back on strike
full on off stump, and worked off his pads to square leg for a single. Gets Kuldeep back on strike. Are India going to do it in singles?
swings across the line! And in the gap. Kuldeep runs back for the second run. Full on off, and he's slog-swept this over the midwicket fielder. Cheers among the Indian fans
round arm ball, full on off. Wedged away to short cover. No chance of a single
full just outside off, and he mistimes a leg-side slog onto his pads. The ball trickles away to the keeper's right and the batsmen scamper across for one!

full on leg stump, and Jadhav misses the flick off his pads. The ball hits his leg and runs away to the short fine-leg boundary! India win by three wickets! The fireworks go off! Kedar Jadhav, you beauty. The Bangladesh boys have a smile on their faces though. Played with excellent spirit.
